Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>…… この戦い、勝てると思うか？
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>, do you think we can win this battle?

Entry.JapaneseText: そうね、勝てる気がする。 勘だけどね。
Entry.EnglishText: Yes, I think we can. That's just my intuition, though.

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたこそ、まだ、生きて 帰ってこられないって思ってる？
Entry.EnglishText: And are you still thinking that you aren't getting out of this alive?

Entry.JapaneseText: これも俺の勘に過ぎないが…… 生きて帰れる、そんな気がするんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Well, this is just my intuition speaking, but... I feel as though I'll be returning in one piece.

Entry.JapaneseText: 勘なんて……軍人らしくないわね。
Entry.EnglishText: Intuition... That's rather un-soldierlike of you.

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺の勘より、おまえの勘のほうが あてになりそうだな。
Entry.EnglishText: Your intuition seems to be more reliable than mine.

Entry.JapaneseText: フフッ……私もそう思うわ……
